兇器: (きょうき) - dangerous weapon; lethal weapon; deadly weapon
兇変: (きょうへん) - catastrophe; assassination; calamity; disaster
兇悪: (きょうあく) - atrocious; fiendish; brutal; villainous

兇状持ち: (きょうじょうもち) - person with a criminal record; violent criminal
兇行人: (きょうこうにん) - brute; violent criminal; savage
先: (sen/saki) - previous , previous, prior, former, first, earlier, some time ago, preceding; point (e.g. pencil), tip, end, nozzle; head (of a line), front; ahead, the other side
先々: (さきざき) - distant future/inevitable future; places one goes to
先々月: (せんせんげつ) - month before last
先々週: (せんせんしゅう) - week before last
先が思いやられる: (さきがおもいやられる) - (I can tell) it's going to be hard going
先が見える: (さきがみえる) - to envision how things will turn out (usu. unfortunate); to have foresight/to be able to see the future
先き: (さき) - previous/prior/former/some time ago/preceding; point (e.g. pencil)/tip/end/nozzle; head (of a line)/front; ahead/the other side; the future/hereafter; destination; the other party
先ごろ: (さきごろ) - recently; the other day
先ず: (まず) - first (of all)/to start with/about/almost/anyway/well/now; hardly (with neg. verb)
先ずもって: (まずもって) - first of all; in the first place
先ず以って: (まずもって) - first of all; in the first place
先ず以て: (まずもって) - first of all; in the first place
先ず先ず: (まずまず) - tolerable; passable; adequate; so-so
先だって: (さきだって) - recently; the other day
先どり: (さきどり) - receiving in advance/taking before others; prefetch; anticipatory completion/finishing another person's sentence in anticipation of what likely to be said next
先に: (さきに) - before; earlier than; ahead; beyond; away; previously; recently
先に立つ: (さきにたつ) - to lead/to take the initiative; to take precedence (e.g. sadness taking precedence over anger); to be most essential
先に通す: (さきにとおす) - to let (a person) pass first
先のことは分からない: (さきのことはわからない) - one never knows (what will happen); there's no telling (what the future holds)
先の日: (さきのひ) - the other day; a few days ago
先の総理大臣: (さきのそうりだいじん) - former prime minister
先の話: (さきのはなし) - a long way off; matter for the future; not going to happen anytime soon
先ほど: (さきほど) - some time ago; not long ago; just now
先ほどらい: (さきほどらい) - since a little while ago
先ほど来: (さきほどらい) - since a little while ago
先もって: (まずもって) - first of all; in the first place
先をあらそって: (さきをあらそって) - fighting to be first; scrambling to take the lead
先を争って: (さきをあらそって) - fighting to be first; scrambling to take the lead
先を急ぐ: (さきをいそぐ) - to hurry; to hasten
先を越される: (さきをこされる) - to be scooped by
先を越す: (せんをこす) - to take the initiative; to forestall; to beat to the punch
先んじる: (さきんじる) - to precede; to forestall; to anticipate
先んずる: (さきんずる) - to go before; to precede; to forestall; to anticipate
先んずれば人を制す: (さきんずればひとをせいす) - First come, first served
先カンブリア時代: (せんカンブリアじだい) - Precambrian era
先主: (せんしゅ) - former master; late master
先付: (さきづけ) - appetizer; later date/post-dating (e.g. a letter or cheque)
先付け: (さきづけ) - appetizer; later date/post-dating (e.g. a letter or cheque)
先代: (せんだい) - family predecessor; previous age; previous generation
先代萩: (センダイハギ) - Russian false yellow lupine (Thermopsis lupinoides)
先以って: (まずもって) - first of all; in the first place
先以て: (まずもって) - first of all; in the first place
先任将校: (せんにんしょうこう) - senior officer
先任者: (せんにんしゃ) - senior official; senior members
先任順: (せんにんじゅん) - order of seniority
先住: (せんじゅう) - previous priest or resident
先住民: (せんじゅうみん) - former inhabitant; indigenous people; aborigines
先住民族: (せんじゅうみんぞく) - aborigines; indigenes
先使用権: (せんしようけん) - right of prior use; prior use rights; prior user rights
先例にならう: (せんれいにならう) - to follow precedent
先例に倣う: (せんれいにならう) - to follow precedent
先先: (さきざき) - distant future/inevitable future; places one goes to
先先月: (せんせんげつ) - month before last
先先週: (せんせんしゅう) - week before last
先入れ先出し: (さきいれさきだし) - first in, first out; FIFO

先入観: (せんにゅうかん) - preconception; prejudice; preoccupation; preconceived notion
先公: (せんこう) - teacher; previous ruler/previous lord/lord of the previous generation
先兵: (せんぺい) - vanguard; advance-guard point; advance detachment
先出: (せんしゅつ) - aforementioned; discussed above; former; previous

先刻承知: (せんこくしょうち) - (yoji) being already (well) aware
